message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product you're selling. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider offers within the range of $1000000 to $1100000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to work together to find a mutually beneficial price. However, considering the product's unique value and features, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1100000. This price still reflects the product's worth, while also taking into account your budget constraints.
